## Docker quickstart
```bash
# Spin up a throwaway MySQL and apply just this package:
docker run --rm -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root -e MYSQL_DATABASE=app -p 3307:3306 -d mysql:8
sleep 15
mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -P 3307 -u root -proot app < schema/001_table.sql
```
